content.en: Enhancing SLAM Algorithms: Researchers have proposed various modifications to the FastSLAM algorithm to improve its performance in simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) problems. These modifications include the use of particle swarm optimization, Jacobian-free cubature, soft computing techniques, differential evolution, and intelligent filtering. These algorithms aim to overcome issues such as particle set degeneracy, errors accumulation, degeneration over time, accuracy issues, particle impoverishment, and computational burden. By implementing these modifications, researchers hope to improve the accuracy, robustness, reliability, and localization performance of SLAM algorithms, particularly for mobile robots operating in harsh terrains or indoor environments.
content.da: Forbedring af SLAM-algoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige modifikationer til FastSLAM-algoritmen for at forbedre dens ydeevne i samtidige lokaliserings- og kortlægningsproblemer (SLAM). Disse modifikationer inkluderer brugen af partikelsværmsoptimering, Jacobian-fri cubature, bløde beregningsteknikker, differentiell evolution og intelligent filtrering. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at overvinde problemer såsom partikelsæts degeneration, fejlakkumulering, degeneration over tid, nøjagtighedsproblemer, partikeludtynding og beregningsmæssig byrde. Ved at implementere disse modifikationer håber forskere at forbedre nøjagtigheden, robustheden, pålideligheden og lokaliseringsydelsen af SLAM-algoritmer, særligt for mobile robotter, der opererer i krævende terræner eller indendørs miljøer.
